Title: I'm caught in a trademark row with Cambridge University – it's terrifying
Description: The 800-year-old university is in a legal battle with the founder of a rowing company.

Title: Trump's grand plan to reshape the world order leaves Europe with a difficult choice to make
Description:
The turbocharged events in Venezuela through to discussions about Greenland all nods to the US’s shifting vision of the world order.
And it leaves the EU with a pressing decision about whose influence to shelter under

Title: Many Americans say the U.S. is not a moral leader but want it to be: NPR/Ipsos poll
Description:
Commissioned by NPR in December in partnership with Ipsos, the share of people who believe the U.S.
is a moral leader dropped to 39% from 60% in a similar poll conducted in 2017.

Title: Poll: Fewer Americans see U.S. as moral leader. And, FBI takes over ICE shooting case
Description:
Many Americans say the U.S.
is not a moral leader but want it to be, according to an NPR/Ipsos poll.
And, the FBI is taking over the investigation into the fatal Minnesota ICE shooting.

Title: YouTube Will Now Let You Filter Shorts Out of Search Results
Description:
YouTube is updating search filters so users can explicitly choose between Shorts and long-form videos.
The change also replaces view-count sorting with a new "Popularity" filter and removes underperforming options like "Sort by Rating." The Verge reports: Rig…

Title: Why Elon Musk says saving for retirement will be 'irrelevant' in the next 20 years
Description: Tesla and SpaceX CEO Elon Musk described a future where technology creates an abundance of resources so "anyone can have whatever stuff they want."

Title: When my family of 4 moved to a small town, we downsized. We now spend more time together and less money.
Description:
When my family of 4 moved to a small town, we downsized and got rid of things we didn't need.
We now spend more time together and less money.

Title: Lego's high-tech Smart Brick is dividing its adult fanbase
Description: Love it or hate it, Lego's Smart Brick has elicited strong reactions from its adult fanbase as they process the analog toymaker's embrace of tech.

Title: The unapologetic office glow-up era is here
Description: What happens when you show up to work with a new nose, face, or body? That's a dilemma more workers are facing.

Title: The military is running out of teenagers to recruit — and old-school methods to reach them are failing
Description:
The military faces a new recruiting crisis as America's teen population shrinks and outreach methods fail.
The Pentagon is rethinking its playbook.
